item.description:
Hi, I (Andrew G) will be leading this walk as Greg has other commitments this day. The walk takes place in Harold Parker's State Forest, a 3000 acre state forest in North Andover a few miles from Route 93. We will meet in the parking lot of the Forest headquarters - see address and maplink below for directions - at 10:30 am and walk for two hours. The walk is fairly flat and will take us through forest and around a couple ponds. The terrain is hiking paths and unpaved (dirt) roads. See link below for more details on the Forest. Afterwards, we will drive over for lunch to

Lee Chen Chinese Cuisine
230 Winthrop Ave
Lawrence, MA 01843
(thanks Linda and Paul for the recommendation)

Feel free to contact me with any questions, including directions. I suggest checking out the website link for details on the state forest, including trails maps.

Look forward to walking with you!

Harold Parker State Forest website link:
http://mass.gov/dcr/p...
item.name: Harold Parker State Forest Walk
